title: Big win!
message: You won the lottery! You gain ยง400.

title: The farm is not a safe place.
message: You've been robbed at gunpoint. Your family feels unsafe and wishes to move away from the farm. You lose ยง200!

title: Switcheroo!
message: You've switched money with another player!

title: Transcendentalism.
message: Through some kind of divine intervention, you are moved 2 tiles forward... Does this mean there is a god?

title: The wayward spirits.
message: Your actions have not been looked upon so kindly by the ancient gods. You move back 2 tiles.

title: The stock market has collapsed.
message: The stock market has collapsed, but you shorted the market! You gain ยง1000, and the knowledge that you earned money off of the suffering of others.

title: Tragedy
message: It's horrific! Ollie hacks your GitHub account. You lose ยง1000.

title: Free ride!
message: You got in a car with a stranger and weren't kidnapped! You move to start.

title: Tim - The Almighty
message: The entity colloquially known as Tim has bestowed upon you victory.
